metadata.title: CVE-2021-47167 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: NFS:Fix an Oopsable condition in __nfs_pageio_add_request() Ensure thatnfs_pageio_error_cleanup() resets the mirror array contents, so that thestructure reflects the fact that it is now empty. Also change the test innfs_pageio_do_add_request() to be more robust by checking whether or notthe list is empty rather than relying on the value of pg_count.
